
name(Introductory Stage)

snap(10,0,-10)
sky(120,180,255)
fog(170,190,210)
clouds(255,255,255,2)
ground(189,175,145,2,-0.1,0.7) //ground(r,g,b,textureNum,addedHueChangeFactor,addedSatChangeFactor)
distfog(10000)
addon(1)

nlaps(2)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,180)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(26,0,11200,0)pr
set(10,0,16800,180)p
set(10,0,22400,0)p
set(10,0,28000,0)
chk(40,0,29000,0)
set(14,0,32550,-90)pt
set(22,-2310,32550,-90)p
set(18,-5670,32550,90)p
set(19,-10220,32550,0)pt
set(21,-10220,28000,0)p
set(15,-10220,22400,0)p
set(15,-10220,16800,0)p
set(35,-10220,17000,0)pr
fix(41,-10220,14000,-1200,0)
set(15,-10220,11200,180)p
set(15,-10220,5600,0)p
set(21,-10220,0,180)p
set(19,-10220,-4550,90)pt
set(22,-7910,-4550,-90)p
set(10,-4550,-4550,90)
chk(40,-2000,-4550,90)
set(14,0,-4550,180)pt

set(24,-4550,0,180)
set(16,-4550,2800,0)
set(15,-4550,8400,0)
set(15,-4550,14000,0)
set(15,-4550,19600,0)
set(15,-4550,25200,0)
set(24,-4550,28000,0)
set(33,-4550,10000,0)
set(33,-4550,14000,0)
set(33,-4550,18000,0)


set(69,-2025,3250,0)
set(68,-12425,4050,90)
set(67,1475,23825,90)
set(67,-8475,24500,-90)
set(66,-12300,21175,-90)
set(65,-7175,10875,-90)
set(65,-5225,-2525,0)
set(66,-2354,4354,0)
set(67,-1998,4968,0)
set(67,-4665,-2654,-90)
set(66,-7523,10217,0)
set(66,1627,24376,180)
set(69,1810,30758,180)
set(65,-12516,22244,180)
set(68,-7873,11534,180)
set(66,1860,32028,-90)
set(65,-7598,25711,90)
set(68,-7139,29548,0)
set(66,-12931,5506,90)



maxr(10,4000,-6000)
maxb(4,-8400,-12800)
maxt(4,39600,-12800)
maxl(10,-15200,-6000)
